languages.text: "Раз только ты поняла, с чем имеешь дело, услышав описание планеты — значит, это был только твой секрет и ничей больше. И тебе решать, как им пользоваться".
"If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."
languages.original_text: "Раз только ты поняла, с чем имеешь дело, услышав описание планеты — значит, это был только твой секрет и ничей больше. И тебе решать, как им пользоваться".

traits.locale_text: "If you were the only one who realized what you were dealing with once the planet was described to you — then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do with it."
"If you were the only one who realized what you were dealing with once the planet was described to you — then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do with it."
"If you were the only one who realized what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."
"If you were the only one who realized what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."
"If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."

languages.text: “如果当时那么多人听到了那颗行星的情况，却只有你一个人意识到了它的含义，那这个秘密就应该归你自己所有，你因此做出的决定也无可指摘。”
languages.original_text: "If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."

traits.locale_text: “如果当时那么多人听到了那颗行星的情况，却只有你一个人意识到了它的含义，那这个秘密就应该归你自己所有，你因此做出的决定也无可指摘。”

languages.text: «Si era la única en percatarse de con qué estaba tratando al escuchar la descripción del planeta, entonces el secreto era suyo y de nadie más. Lo mismo se aplica a la decisión de qué hacer al respecto».
languages.original_text: "If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."

traits.locale_text: «Si era la única en percatarse de con qué estaba tratando al escuchar la descripción del planeta, entonces el secreto era suyo y de nadie más. Lo mismo se aplica a la decisión de qué hacer al respecto».

languages.text: 「この惑星について説明された時点で、何に関わることになるのかに気づいたのがお前だけだったとしたら、この秘密はお前だけのものであり、他の誰のものでもない。それをどうするかという決断も同じだ」
languages.original_text: "If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星について説明された時点で、何に関わることになるのかに気づいたのがお前だけだったとしたら、この秘密はお前だけのものであり、他の誰のものでもない。それをどうするかという決断も同じだ」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr als Einzige erkannt habt, worum es sich bei dem Euch beschriebenen Planeten tatsächlich handelte, gehörte dieses Geheimnis Euch und sonst niemandem. Ebenso wie die Entscheidung, was daraufhin zu tun war."
languages.original_text: "If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr als Einzige erkannt habt, worum es sich bei dem Euch beschriebenen Planeten tatsächlich handelte, gehörte dieses Geheimnis Euch und sonst niemandem. Ebenso wie die Entscheidung, was daraufhin zu tun war."

languages.text: « Si vous seule avez fait le rapprochement avec Sainte Argenta quand on vous a parlé de cette planète, ce secret n'appartenait qu'à vous, de même que la décision de vous y rendre. »
languages.original_text: "If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous seule avez fait le rapprochement avec Sainte Argenta quand on vous a parlé de cette planète, ce secret n'appartenait qu'à vous, de même que la décision de vous y rendre. »

languages.text: "Gezegen tasvir edildiğinde olan biteni bir tek sen fark etmişsin... Bu sır, yalnızca ve yalnızca sana ait. Dolayısıyla... Ne yapılacağına karar vermek de senin hakkındır."
languages.original_text: "If you were the only one who realised what you were dealing with once the planet had been described to you, then this secret was yours and no one else's. As is the decision of what to do about it."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegen betimlendiğinde olan biteni fark eden tek kişi senmişsin… Bu sır, yalnızca ve yalnızca sana ait, başkasına değil. Dolayısıyla… Ne yapılacağına karar vermek de senin hakkındı."
